story: You stand before a massive, metal door with a keypad locked in place. The wall above displays a countdown timer, and the air is thick with tension.

actions.action: Enter the correct code to unlock the door
actions.good: You enter the code correctly, and the door slides open, revealing a hidden cache of valuable items.
actions.bad: You enter an incorrect code, triggering an alarm that deals damage to you. The loot remains out of reach.

actions.action: Try to smash through the door with brute force
actions.good: With great strength, you pry the door open, revealing a stash of valuable items.
actions.bad: Your efforts trigger a hidden trap, causing damage to you. The loot remains just out of reach.

actions.action: Use your cyberdeck to bypass the security system
actions.good: You successfully hack into the system, granting you access to a hidden cache of valuable items.
actions.bad: Your attempt triggers an automated defense system, dealing damage to you. The loot remains tantalizingly out of reach.
